IPAccessControl.description: This resource is used to obtain or modify the IP access control managed by a given manager.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

IPAccessControl.longDescription: This object shall be used to represent the IP access control settings for the manager.

ServiceEnabled.description: Indicates if the IP access control is enabled for this manager.
ServiceEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the enabled status of the IP access control.  The value shall be true if enabled and false if disabled.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

FilterRules.description: This is a reference to a collection of IP access setting that this manager uses for IP access control.
FilterRules.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a link to a collection of type IPAccessControl which are for the use of this manager.

title: #IPAccessControl.v1_0_1.IPAccessControl
